meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read as 02271.1 (2271.1 m³). The red needle is pointing directly at the 6 o'clock position, which is exactly halfway between the 0.05 and 0.06 marks on the dial. Following the rule to choose the closest value and lowering confidence if ambiguous, 0.05 was selected as the last fully passed mark before the halfway point. The needle's angle is 180 degrees from the 12 o'clock (m³) position.
